DOC.brief_summary: To see the effect of Folic acid supplementation after kidney transplantation on plasma total homocysteine level and carotid intimal-media thickness
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Folic Acid Effect on Hcy and cIMT After Kidney Tx
DOC.criteria: having hyperhomocysteinemia(tHcy>12.5 µmol/L in men and 11.5 µmol/L in women ) No evident history of CVD 4. no evidence of cigarette smoking not participating in other clinical studies on evaluation of cardiac diseases and not taking any lipid lowering treatment not being pregnant or breast feeding a baby(women) Having HIV or viral hepatitis infections. unstable condition of the transplanted kidney (Cr> 3 mg/dl, BUN > 50 mg/dl) Cyclosporine (CsA) intoxication New onset of any severe disease ( such as MI, stroke, DM, etc.).
